hadiths.text: Al-Aswad bin Shaiban As-Sadusi said:"I heard 'Ata' being asked by a man: 'We travel and drinks are offered to us in the marketplaces, and we do not know what kind of vessels they were prepared in.' He said: 'Every intoxicant is unlawful.' He repeated the question and he said: 'Every intoxicant is unlawful.' He repeated the question and he said: 'It is as I have told you

chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of Every Drink that Intoxicates
